about_the_game:
About Midnight Horde:

Midnight Horde is a gothic horror action rogue-lite that flips the traditional bullet hell formula with intense, vertical parkour mechanics. Set in a medieval European city during the early 1900, you’ll scale towering castles, leap across rooftops, and dive into the fray against hordes of twisted enemies. With every attempt, grow stronger, unlock new abilities, and push back against the darkness that threatens to consume everything. The Midnight Horde is relentless, but you’ll adapt, overcome, and survive.

Reverse Bullet Hell, with Gravity and Parkour!

Prepare for a whole new bullet hell experience where movement is just as important as any sword or spell. Midnight Horde reimagines bullet hell with dynamic, gravity-defying parkour, letting you dart through waves of enemies. Utilize mechanics like dashing, wall-climbing, and rooftop-jumping to maneuver through overwhelming odds.

Complete Quests to Unlock New Classes and Abilities!

Take on quests to uncover and unlock powerful new classes and abilities. Complete quests that span across multiple playthroughs, rewarding you with new ways to approach the game’s challenges. Find the class that best suits your tactics and watch as your arsenal grows with new powers and skills.

Build Your Way to Success!

In Midnight Horde, victory isn't achieved through skill alone; strategy plays a pivotal role. Discover and construct unique buildings throughout the city, each offering powerful perks, defenses, and even synergies that can turn the tide in your favor. Every map can be fortified and improved upon, with upgrades that strengthen your hold against the Midnight Horde. Use these to adapt each run to your playstyle, maximizing your defenses and building your way toward triumph in the endless night.

Features

  • Unique buildings that used wisely will turn the tide of battle

  • Defeat the Generals of the Midnight Horde

  • Unlock several maps as you fight to push back the Midnight Horde from the city center

  • Unlock unique classes that allows for different playstyles

  • A unique parkour movement system that lets you fly between the rooftops of a medieval city under siege.

  • Quest-based meta progression

  • A large selection of skills and perks with synergies and fuse mechanics

  • Gothic bosses with diverse attack patterns

  • Every map can be improved upon as you add more buildings with unique traits and abilities.
